entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Fourchu Head
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.4°C

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain or snow ending late in the morning then cloudy with flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
